# pspm

pspm is Python's Simplest Package Manager.

## Installation

I recommend using [pipx](https://pipx.pypa.io/stable/) to install pspm.

```bash
pipx install pspm
```

## Quickstart
### Install packages
```bash
spm add -g dev pytest
```
